summary: This document is Citibank's response to a federal subpoena (Ref. No: LSI-08192019-327098-002) issued in the Epstein investigation. It includes an affidavit from a Citibank legal specialist certifying the provided records, a DOJ request form, and a payment/EFT enrollment form showing account details for Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Mark Lubin
persons.context: Addressee of the subpoena response letter from Citibank; the financial records are to be delivered to him.

persons.name: Renae A. Rodriguez
persons.role: Legal Support Specialist / Custodian of Records for Citibank
persons.context: Author of the cover letter and affidavit certifying that Citibank is providing the subpoenaed financial records in the matter of Jeffrey Epstein et al.

persons.name: Paula Mancilla
persons.context: Notarized the affidavit signed by Renae A. Rodriguez.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: Named as an account holder (JEFFREY E. EPSTEIN) on the EFT enrollment form, with accounts at Citibank.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as an account holder (GHISLAINE MAXWELL) on the EFT enrollment form, with accounts at Citibank.

connections.description: Both are listed as account holders on the same Citibank EFT enrollment form, indicating a shared financial connection through the bank.
Rodriguez, as Citibank's legal custodian, is certifying and providing Epstein's financial records in response to a federal subpoena.
Rodriguez, as Citibank's legal custodian, is certifying and providing Maxwell's financial records in response to a federal subpoena.

events.title: DOJ Subpoena Issued to Citibank
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's office issued a subpoena (Ref. No: LSI-08192019-327098-002) to Citibank for financial records related to Jeffrey Epstein et al.

events.title: Citibank Compliance and Record Submission
events.description: Citibank, via Renae A. Rodriguez, submitted certified financial records and an affidavit in response to the federal subpoena.

locations: 26 Federal Plaza, New York, NY 10278 (FBI office)
100 Citibank Dr., Bldg. 1 Floor 2, San Antonio, TX 78245 (Citibank Subpoena Compliance Unit)
701 E 60th St N, Sioux Falls, SD 57117 (Citibank address associated with Epstein/Maxwell accounts)
keyFacts: Citibank provided financial records for Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell in response to a federal subpoena (LSI-08192019-327098-002) issued by the U.S. Attorney's office.
The records include an EFT enrollment form explicitly listing 'JEFFREY E. EPSTEIN' and 'GHISLAINE MAXWELL' as account holders with Citibank.
Citibank stated that statements prior to June 2008 and backup documents prior to September 2012 were no longer available, potentially limiting the historical scope of the investigation.
The document demonstrates active federal investigation into Epstein's financial affairs as of August/September 2019, following his arrest and death.
The response was formally certified under penalty of perjury by a Citibank legal custodian and notarized, indicating the records' intended use as legal evidence.
